content: Claude Cowork is a new feature within the Claude Desktop app that grants AI direct access to a user's files and folders, enabling task execution without terminal commands or code.
Users can leverage Claude Cowork by describing desired tasks and allowing the AI to autonomously complete the work.

Claude Cowork can perform diverse business tasks, including organizing files, editing podcast videos into short-form clips, analyzing transcript themes and content gaps, conducting brand voice reviews of email marketing, and building productivity dashboards connected to Gmail, Google Calendar, and Notion.
Using Claude Cowork for multiple business tasks can replace the need for five separate applications and hours of manual work.
